text:
forecast. The sarima forecast() below implements this behavior.
The function takes an array or list of contiguous prior observations and a list of conﬁguration
parameters used to conﬁgure the model, speciﬁcally two tuples and a string for the trend
order, seasonal order trend, and parameter. We also try to make the model robust by relaxing
constraints, such as that the data must be stationary and that the MA transform be invertible.
# one-step sarima forecast
